title: Free Counsellor Florrick
content:
You can sneak into the prison through a hole in the western wall of the Wyrm's Rock. There are flaming fists patrolling the prison. Use one of your characters in Turn-based mode to Florrick's cell, lockpick the door and escort her out. Florrick is a potential ally in Gather Your Allies. (Summon Florrick's personal guard - highly defensive warriors who can hold their own in melee.)

How to unlock Free Counsellor Florrick

Free Counsellor Florrick Rewards

Florrick as a potential ally in Gather Yo
